original_text: I myself did not know him, but the reason I came baptizing with water was that he might be revealed to Israel.”
korean_text: 나도 그를 알지 못하였으나 내가 와서 물로 세례를 베푸는 것은 그를 이스라엘에 나타내려 함이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: I myself did not know him
but the reason I came baptizing with water
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 물로 세례를 주러 온 이유는

sentences.original_text: was that he might be revealed to Israel
